metadata.title: CVE-2017-17054 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In aubio 0.4.6, a divide-by-zero error exists in the function new_aubio_source_wavread() in source_wavread.c, which may lead to DoS when playing a crafted audio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aubio-tools - 0.4.6-2
libaubio5 - 0.4.6-2
python3-aubio - 0.4.6-2
No subscription required

notes.note: debian> vulnerability introduced in 0.4.3 msalvatore> It looks to me like the patch is needed in xenial and trusty

criterions.comment: aubio package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.6-2').
